metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9639 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Salt before 2015.8.11 allows deleted minions to read or write to minions with the same id, related to caching.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> The rotate_aes_key setting in 2015.8.11 and newer defeats this issue. If it is disabled in newer releases this issue is re-opened.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
